oai_dc:dc.dc:description: How the Feather Brushes used in springbok hunting are prepared and smoked. By /han=kass'o (L VIII.-23. 8073-8075, 8083 1/2 and 8083 1/2 rev.). 1) See also Tactics in springbok hunting, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-23.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The preparation of feather brushes used in springbok hunting
